desc:
Please can the following be done for the moving of upliftment agents into their own companies?

The following agents need to be moved from the upliftment agent company to their own company.

Reyn Varkevisser
Nico Campher
Franscois Joubert
Jossie Wiggill

These agentsâ€™ companies must be categorized as upliftment agents.
All reports for agents relating to billing must show all users with a role of upliftment agents but the report must group the results by company so we can separate out the data.

The reports that must be amended are:

Agent Queries
Agent Invoices
Agent Invoices per agent (Must include the option to report on an entire upliftment agent company)
Agent Uplifted Totals
Agent On Hold Totals
Agent On Hold Bad Quality
Agent Duplicates Total
Cases Uplifted by Agent

Once this has been completed, I will add the sub agents into each of the new companies.
name: CW - CCW317 - Move agents
